frontmatter.name: Haim Helman
frontmatter.bio: Haim was the CTO and co-founder of Octarine, now part of the Security BU in VMware. Octarine created a continuous security platform for applications in Kubernetes. He has been leading enterprise infrastructure innovation for the last 20 years. Before Octarine, he co-founded XIV, an enterprise storage company which was acquired by IBM. Following his time at IBM he was a member of the founding team at Robin Systems, where he first encountered the promise and challenges of cloud-native architecture. He holds a BSc in Math, Physics and Computer Science from the Hebrew University in Jerusalem and an MSc in Computer Science from Tel Aviv University.
